group.label: SWT
group.text: Run SWT samples using either the standalone SWT launcher or as an integrated workbench view.

link.label: Workbench views and standalone applications
link.text: The SWT Example launcher will allow you to launch a collection of SWT examples. Some of the examples can be run independent of the eclipse platform and others will be available as views inside the workbench.

group.label: Workbench
group.text: The following samples demonstrate how to tightly integrate into the Eclipse workbench.

link.label: Multi-page editor
link.text: Shows how to create an editor with multiple pages

link.label: Property sheet and outline
link.text: Demonstrates how to use property sheet and outline views

link.label: Readme tool
link.text: Shows how to create your own extension points
